Package videogame.main

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
videogame.main.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
This class is the main class for building the whole game

      public GameLogic()

  • Method Details

    • readInt

      public static int readInt(String prompt, int userChoices)
      This method is for reading the input of the user prompting him to enter an integer. It is called in other methods where the user will use it to proceed with the game.
      Parameters:
      prompt - It is the input of the user which will be stored in string format. It represents the choice of the user
      userChoices - the number of choices will be hardcoded through the game when calling the method
      Returns:
      The choice of the user in integer format

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      This is a simple method for display purposes. It prints a lot of 100 lines in the terminal whenever the method is called

    • printSeperator

      public static void printSeperator(int n)
      This is a method to display a line of dashes whenever it is called.
      Parameters:
      n - It is the number of dashes

    • printHeading

      public static void printHeading(String title)
      This method is used whenever we want to display a string as a heading.
      Parameters:
      title - The hardcoded string that we want to display as heading

    • anythingToContinue

      public static void anythingToContinue()
      This method is used to enter takes any value from user.

    • startGame

      public static void startGame()
      This method is used to start the game. We need to input our name, and we can change our name if it is incorrect. It creates a player object and set isRunning to true for the gameLoop to continue. It then calls the method gameLoop.

    • checkAct

      public static void checkAct()
      This method enables us to level up in the game.

    • randomEncounter

      public static void randomEncounter()
      This method which presents a random encounter to the player. eg fight, rests or shop

    • continueJourney

      public static void continueJourney()
      method continueJourney() will generate random encounters for the player to defeat. If enough enemies are defeated, player is taken to the next stage/level/act.

    • characterInfo

      public static void characterInfo()
      method characterInfo() gives the player the option to see their current inventory and statistics such as current health, available currency(gold), number of consumables and XP.

    • printMenu

      public static void printMenu()
      method printMenu() will print the main menu options. Options such as continuing, exiting the game or displaying character information.

    • gameLoop

      public static void gameLoop()
      method gameLoop() will either keep the game running, display character information or exit. This depends on user input and any option can be accessed anytime.

    • FirstActBoss

      public static void FirstActBoss()

    • SecondActBoss

      public static void SecondActBoss()

    • ThirdActBoss

      public static void ThirdActBoss()

    • finalBattle

      public static void finalBattle()
      This method is for the final battle. The enemy that the player has to fight is The evil emperor

    • playerDied

      public static void playerDied()
      This method is to display a message to indicate that the player died in case he was defeated by the enemy

    • shop

      public static void shop()
      This method is called when the player meets a mysterious stranger from whom he can shop potions only if he has enough gold.

    • takeRest

      public static void takeRest()
      This method asks the player if he is willing to take a rest. If player's health is full, and he wants to take rest, he will not be able to take rest. If he is not at full health and wishes to take rest, he will be allowed to do so. If he chooses not to take rest, he will continue to play.

    • randomBattle

      public static void randomBattle()
      This method is creating a battle with a random enemy.

    • battle

      public static void battle(Enemy enemy)
      This method will give the player the option to fight, use potion, run away from encountered enemy or Judgement. If player chooses to fight, the damage caused by the enemy and to the enemy will be accounted. If he chooses to use potion, he will be able to use it only if he possesses any. If he chooses to run away, he might deal with damage from the enemy if he chooses Judgement, he can cause massive damage to enemy
      Parameters:
      enemy - It takes the random enemy generated from randomBattle, and for finalBattle it will take THE EVIL EMPEROR.
